title: LILLUSORY Women's Summer Casual Flutter Sleeve Square Neck Smocked Midi Dress
description: A comfy-meets-pretty piece. This midi dress features a flatterting square neckline, smocked bodice and swing a-line silhouette.
Made of a soft fabric that drapes beautifully against your figure. The smocked bodice provides plenty of stretchy movement. And the flutter sleeves finish off the look with a light and airy touch.

You can't go wrong with this dress! Great for casual, daily, beach, vacation, holiday, wedding, party, dating, easter, bridal shower, photoshoot, etc. Easy to pair with sunglasses, earrings, necklace, heels, wedges, sandals.
Size: Please Refer To Size Chart For Details Before Purchase Which We Provide In Our Pictures
Wash Care: Hand washable, machine washable with laundry bag recommended, do not bleach/iron, hang/line to dry.
